name: chexmix

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
ChExMix: the ChIP-exo mixture model. ChExMix aims to characterize
protein-DNA binding subtypes in ChIP-exo experiments.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependencies.name: meme
dependencies.description:
The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in
collections of unaligned nucleotide or protein sequences, and to perform
a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.
